title: LIGHTSABER
lyrics:
Light light light light light
Light light light light light
neon weroun kkot chagapge eoreun
nunppit gipsugi sumeun byeolppit
geu jiteun eodum sok gin jame ppajin
neoreul kkaeweonael suman ittamyeon



meolli challanhage ppeodeun bicheul ttarawa

yeogi chaoreuneun nunbushimeul neukkyeo bwa

neoye sesange naega daeul ttae

kkaeeona neoreul piweonae



soneul naemin neol jikireo igoseul

chaja hemaetteon neoreul wihan Savior

amheuk sok naega soneul jabeulkke A life saver

Lightsaber, lightsaber, lightsaber, lightsaber

Lightsaber (Drop)



Oh, lightsaber, oh (Drop)



Light light light light light ooh woah ooh woah

Light light light light lightsaber

Light light light light light ooh woah ooh woah

Light light light light lightsaber



eoreotteon neoye mameul noganaerige hae

geu soge ijen neowa naega biche chumeul chweo



Here we go, danger wiheomhae

eodume bichi bakin moyangsaen

deo seodulleo meondong teugi jeon

nugudo mot boge neoreul deryeowa nae yeope

gogael sugyeo hayake taneun

naye geurimjareul ttaraomyeon dwae

gwedohaneun shigong sogeseo jogeumsshik

seonmyeonghaejineun challa nuneul gama jamshi



Light light light light light ooh woah ooh woah

(Light light) Light light light light lightsaber (Woah)

Light light light light light ooh woah ooh woah (Ah)

Lightsaber lightsaber (Oh)



byeolcheoreom ssodajeo eodumeul geoseulleo

neoreul piweonael shigan

gamchun neoye nunmulmajeo

bichi nage saebyeok kkeute wasseo

modu jejariro ganeun gil

baro yeogie nae modeun geol nege julkke



soneul naemin neol jikireo igoseul

chaja hemaetteon neoreul wihan Savior

amheuk sok naega bichi dwae julkke

A life saver, lightsaber



Light light light light light ooh woah ooh woah

(Ooh) Light light light light lightsaber

(Lightsaber, light light light light)

Light light light light light ooh woah ooh woah

Light light light light lightsaber (Light lightsaber)

(Drop) Light light light light light ooh woah ooh woah

(Ooh woah ooh woah ooh yeah, yeah)

Light light light light lightsaber

Lightsaber, lightsaber, lightsaber, lightsaber



Lightsaber
